summary: Professional photography website with a homepage, portfolio section, and about me section.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Dramatic full-screen hero photograph: misty mountain landscape at golden hour with rich warm tones and depth (hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Portrait photograph of a professional photographer in a studio setting with soft warm lighting and dark background (photographer-portrait.dim_600x800.png)
- Fine-art black and white portrait of a woman with dramatic side lighting (portfolio-1.dim_800x1000.png)
- Aerial landscape photograph of rolling green hills with morning fog (portfolio-2.dim_1000x800.png)
- Intimate wedding couple silhouette at sunset on a beach (portfolio-3.dim_800x1000.png)
- Close-up macro photograph of a dew-covered flower petal with bokeh background (portfolio-4.dim_800x800.png)
- Urban cityscape at night with light trails and neon reflections on wet pavement (portfolio-5.dim_1000x800.png)
- Minimalist still life of analog film camera on a wooden surface with warm lighting (portfolio-6.dim_800x800.png)
- Forest path in autumn with golden leaves and soft diffused light (portfolio-7.dim_800x1000.png)
- Dramatic stormy seascape with crashing waves and moody sky (portfolio-8.dim_1000x800.png)
- Candid street photography moment in a European cobblestone alley at dusk (portfolio-9.dim_800x1000.png)

existing_features.title: Create a single-page React application with smooth scroll navigation linking to three sections: Homepage (Hero), Portfolio, and About Me. Include a fixed top navigation bar with the photographer's brand name and anchor links to each section.

Build a full-screen Hero section on the Homepage featuring a large background photography image, an overlaid headline (e.g., 'Capturing Moments That Last a Lifetime'), a short tagline, and a call-to-action button that scrolls to the Portfolio section.
Build a Portfolio section that displays a responsive masonry or grid gallery of photography sample images. Each image should be clickable to open a full-screen lightbox view with a close button.

Build an About Me section featuring a professional photographer portrait image, a biography paragraph, a list of specialties or skills (e.g., Portrait, Landscape, Wedding), and contact/social media links.

Apply a cohesive dark-mode editorial visual theme across the entire site: deep charcoal/black backgrounds, off-white and warm gold typography, generous whitespace, elegant serif font for headings, and clean sans-serif for body text. The aesthetic should feel high-end and gallery-like, consistent with luxury photography studios.

new_feature_requests.summary: Homepage with professional photography branding and hero section
Portfolio section to showcase photography work
About Me section with photographer bio and info
